textBox.richText: We just got back from vacation this week!  No computers, no telephones, no IM, no text messages, no stress (just the occasional deer, moose or bear).  Several years ago, I didn’t take any vacation at all during the year and promptly vowed never to do that again.  In just one week of vacation, you can reduce all of the stress that you worked so hard to build up all year long.   Remember that Canadian companies are famous worldwide for overworking their employees and not giving vacation time.
